snippet.title: Little Heroine Playset (Yuri Jam 2019 entry)
snippet.description:
For my submission to this year's Yuri Game Jam, I wrote a Touhou game from the ground up in Game Maker. With the help of a portrait artist and a musician, we made something really cute! The time span of the jam only allowed for one stage, and there are still a few missing pieces (placeholder fairy sprites, lack of music during boss dialogue, etc.) but I'm really happy with how it came out.

The game can be downloaded here:
https://teamshanghaihourai.itch.io/little-heroine-playset
